name: Kill IT
description:
Staked out in an long abandoned town. You are set with the task to collect the corpses of goblins, and trade them in for better gear and more weapons.

You last as long as you live. Lets see how long you live.

Yes, I am well aware that around 10 minutes the amount of enemies becomes insane. But don't worry, for I shall fix the problem! Once the lights finish baking...I'll also try building for mac and linux.

Let me know if you find any bugs, or have any feedback!
